tool_description:
Entrepreneur's experiences to increase chances for success
+999 Entrepreneur mindsets are the collection of different entrepreneur's opinions and skills that enable people to identify and make the most of opportunities, overcome and learn from setbacks, and succeed in a variety of settings.
Use it anywhere on GitHub, Your Website or wherever you like
name: Entrepreneur Mindset Collection
title: Entrepreneur Mindset Collection

api_list.name: Random Quote in JSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entrepreneur-mindset-collection.p.rapidapi.com/quote?type=json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entrepreneur-mindset-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
